products.name: Chicken Soup
products.description: Flavorful stock, egg noodles, vegetables and chicken make this classic soup an all-time favorite.

products.name: Grilled Chicken
products.description: Grilled chicken breast with a tangy tarragon blue cheese sauce served with grilled asparagus and a side of Jasmine rice.

products.name: Grilled Salmon
products.description: Nothing beats a classic and this Teriyaki Glazed Salmon is no exception. This salmon is roasted and packed with flavor, making it a great option for a simple weeknight meal.

products.name: Chickpea Salad
products.description: Chickpea Salad is rich with crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, creamy avocado and feta cheese. The fresh lemon dressing adds the Mediterranean flavors of classic Greek Salad.

products.name: Fruit Salad
products.description: A sweet mixture of various fruits in a thick sweet cream.

products.name: Caesar Salad
products.description: Fresh chopped romaine lettuce and red onion rings topped with a Greek Caesar dressing that is Caesar with tomato, cucumber and feta cheese.

products.name: Lemon Cake
products.description: When the cake comes out of the oven it is infused with a homemade lemon syrup to give it an extra lemon kick, and then after cooling down the cake is topped with the most delicious lemon glaze

products.name: Cheesecake
products.description: A rich and creamy New York-style cheesecake baked inside a honey-graham crust. Try with sweet strawberries in strawberry sauce, or with blueberry toppings for an additional charge.

products.name: Snickers Pie
products.description: Snickers pie is a chocolate dessert made with Snickers bars, mascarpone and soft cheese.
